title: Keychron K8 Microphone Button to Zoom Mute

to.shell_command: if [ $(ps aux | grep -v grep | grep -ci "zoom.us.app/Contents/Frameworks/cpthost.app/Contents/MacOS/CptHost") -gt 0 ]; then osascript -e 'activate application id "us.zoom.xos"' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "a" using {command down, shift down}'; fi

rules.description: Change Fn + Spacebar to Shift + Cmd + A
